Article Summary: Jaime king recently lost custody of both her children in a difficult legal battle. Taylor swift is standing by jaime king and staying committed to her godson, leo thames. Swift shares a close bond with king and her godson leo thames, who she also has a relationship with.

Article Title: Chiefs risk controversy with "greenest green flag" Travis Kelce as mother Donna Kelce drops major Taylor Swift hint in latest post
Article Text:
(Image via Imagn Images)

Noah Gray's rise makes Chiefs' tight end choice obvious

Donna Kelce proudly celebrates Taylor Swift’s huge night at iHeartRadio Music Awards

"This is the greenest green flag to ever green flag,"

Read More

The Kansas City Chiefs have Travis Kelce back for the 2025-26 season, but his days as the team's top tight end might be numbered.Kelce returns to the Chiefs at age 35, clearly past his prime years. He's a franchise legend, racking up 12,151 receiving yards over 174 regular season games. But his numbers have steadily declined since 2022, the last season he crossed 1,000 receiving yards.Last season, Kelce caught 97 passes on 133 targets, but managed just three touchdowns—his career-low. It's reassuring to see Kelce on the field again, but the Chiefs should strongly consider increasing Noah Gray 's snaps.Noah Gray, drafted in the fifth round by the Chiefs in 2021, keeps improving. Last season was Gray's best yet, posting career-highs with 437 receiving yards and five touchdowns from 40 catches on 49 targets.At age 26, Gray is entering his prime years. Keeping him limited behind a declining Kelce could be a serious mistake. Kansas City recognized Gray’s potential with a contract extension, clearly seeing his value beyond a typical fifth-round pick.Pro Football Focus graded Gray at 74.2 last season, placing him eighth among all tight ends. Kelce's grade was 70.9, ranking him 15th. Gray objectively outperformed Kelce, suggesting it's time for Kansas City to prioritize youth over legacy.Taylor Swift dominated the recent iHeartRadio Music Awards , earning nine awards, including Artist of the Year, Pop Artist of the Year, and a special honor for her global "Eras Tour," plus six fan-voted categories.Though Swift missed the event at the Dolby Theater in LA, she sent a recorded acceptance speech. Fans speculated her boyfriend, Chiefs star Travis Kelce, filmed the video, citing what appeared to be his reflection in Swift's trophy.While that theory remains uncertain, Donna Kelce, Travis' mother, made her support clear. Mama Kelce proudly posted Swift’s awards haul on Instagram, gathering over 85,000 likes and enthusiastic reactions from fans.a fan another.Donna Kelce has formed a close bond with Swift since she started dating Travis in the summer of 2023, often sitting together at Chiefs games at Arrowhead Stadium. Mama Kelce also openly supports her other daughter-in-law, Kylie Kelce—wife of former NFL player Jason Kelce—recently comforting the couple following the loss of their dog.Swifties have always looked out for Taylor, especially when it comes to her relationships. Her love life’s been picked apart for years, and fans have stayed cautious—especially about how her partners’ families treated her. That’s why Donna’s warm, genuine support stands out. It feels like Taylor’s finally with someone whose family truly values and embraces her.
Article Summary: Travis kelce returns to the chiefs at age 35, clearly past his prime years. Noah gray, drafted in the fifth round by the chiefs in 2021, keeps improving. Gray objectively outperformed kelce, suggesting it's time for kansas city to prioritize youth over legacy.

Article Title: "I thought he’s gone": Dwayne Wade’s wife Gabrielle Union opens up about fearing the worst when the NBA legend was diagnosed with cancer
Article Text:
Image via Rich Fury/Getty Images

Dwayne Wade’s wife, Gabrielle Union, reveals she thought of the worst outcome when the NBA legend was diagnosed with cancer



Gabrielle Union Breaks Silence on Dwyane Wade’s Cancer Fight

Dwayne Wade has been considered as one of the most talented players in the NBA. The NBA legend is a world champion and has achieved a lot of success in his life, but everything came to a standstill in 2023. After a year, Dwayne Wade opened up about his struggles and the difficult days he had to go through while he fought a tough battle against cancer.A few weeks ago, Dwayne Wade opened up about his journey on his podcast, the WY Network,where he revealed that he decided to go for a health checkup normally and ended up with an inconclusive diagnosis.It was only on the recommendation of a third doctor that the NBA legend decided to undergo surgery and remove a significant portion of one of his kidneys. But Dwayne Wade’s battle did not end there.The NBA legend revealed that he faced difficulties in opening up to his family. He said, “My own journey to have that surgery, I think it was the first time that my family, my dad, my kids, they saw me weak. That moment was probably the weakest point I’ve ever felt in my life.”A few days later, his wife, popular actress, Gabrielle Union, appeared on The View and spoke about the emotional toll their family went through.Gabrielle Union said, "You hear cancer, you're paralyzed because you think of the absolute worst-case scenario. I've had so many friends who are cancer survivors. I didn't go there; I went to 'he's gone.' "Gabrielle Union also added that Dwayne Wade did not even speak to his family about the struggle he was going through.Fortunately, things worked out well for the NBA legend. While he had to remove a major portion of his kidney, it apparently tested positive for Stage 1 cancer.Currently, Dwayne Wade is absolutely healthy and is spreading awareness among his fans about his diagnosis and treatment. His wife, Gabrielle Union, spoke to Access Hollywood last month and reiterated how proud she is of her husband for doing this.Fans have also been very appreciative of Dwayne Wade spreading awareness among his audience, as many are now relieved that he is healthy. The NBA legend retired in 2019 after playing in the NBA for several years and is considered to be one of the most talented and popular players in the world.Also Read: “The toll that it takes on your marriage”: Dwayne Wade's wife Gabrielle Union reflects on the emotional impact of the NBA star's cancer diagnosis on their relationship
Article Summary: Dwayne wade's wife, gabrielle union, reveals she thought of the worst outcome when the nba legend was diagnosed with cancer. The nba legend had to undergo surgery and remove a significant portion of one of his kidneys. After a year, dwayne wade opened up about his struggles and the difficult days he had to go through while he fought a tough battle.

Article Title: Derrick Henry: Derrick Henry sells his home for $1.6 million below asking price, signaling the end of his Cowboys dream
Article Text:
Baltimore Ravens Derrick Henry | Nathan Ray Seebeck-Imagn Images

Derrick Henry bought his Dallas home with hopes of playing for the Cowboys, but it never happened

The Pivot

Derrick Henry Ready to win in Baltimore w/ Lamar, NFL legacy, Alabama’s best & RB future |The Pivot

I knew once free agency started that I wanted to work something out [with the Ravens] if we could,

Even though I’m living in Dallas and Dallas being a perfect situation, as well, because we lived there, we ain’t got to move…”

“They ain’t holla at me at all,”

Dallas could have been a perfect fit, but now Henry is locked in with the Ravens

Baltimore Ravens ’ star running back Derrick Henry has officially sold his Dallas home, but it’s not just a routine real estate transaction—it’s a symbolic farewell to a long-standing dream. Henry, who was once rumored to be eyeing a future with the Dallas Cowboys , sold the property for $1.6 million, falling short of its original asking price. This move marks the final chapter in his connection to Dallas, a city he once hoped to call his permanent NFL home.Henry originally bought the luxurious 4,154-square-foot home in Inwood Park in 2022. Featuring 20-foot ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, marble floors, and hardwood flooring, the property was a high-end investment. The stunning residence offers four bedrooms, four bathrooms, and a spacious three-car garage. Designed for both comfort and style, it boasts a gourmet kitchen, a cozy fireplace, custom walk-in closets, and a lush turf backyard perfect for outdoor relaxation.He first listed it for $1.8 million in 2023 but later took it off the market before relisting it at $1.6 million with a different real estate agency.According to TMZ, the final sale amount has not been disclosed, but sources suggest it was close to the lowered asking price. The sale ends Henry’s residential ties to Dallas, a city he had considered home due to his girlfriend, Adrianna Rivas , having family in the area.While Henry’s Dallas residency was partly personal, it was also fueled by his football aspirations. The running back admitted onpodcast that he had wanted to play for the Cowboys.” Henry said. “Unfortunately for Henry, the Cowboys never approached him.he revealed, making it clear that the interest was one-sided.Many Cowboys fans were thrilled by the idea of Derrick Henry joining the team and teaming up with Dak Prescott. With his powerful running style and Dallas’ solid offensive line, Henry could have brought a whole new level of strength to the offense. His ability to break tackles and wear down defenses seemed like the perfect fit for a team looking to boost its rushing attack. But despite all the excitement and speculation, the Cowboys stuck to their usual cautious approach to building the roster. Instead of making a big move for Henry, they decided to stay the course—meaning the star running back never got the call.Now, he’s set to be a major weapon for the Ravens, forming a lethal ground with his peers. While Cowboys fans may be left wondering what could have been, Ravens fans have every reason to celebrate. Henry isn’t just physically relocating—he’s mentally locked into Baltimore’s Super Bowl aspirations.Also read - Cam Heyward says he "Stole" DK Metcalf from the Chargers, did he cross the line?
Article Summary: Derrick henry sold his dallas home for $1.6 million, falling short of its original asking price. Henry originally bought the luxurious 4,154-square-foot home in inwood park in 2022. With his powerful running style and dallas’ solid offensive line, henry could have brought a whole new level of strength to the offense.

Article Title: “He s*cks”: Brad Marchand’s debut for the Panthers sparks backlash from Bruins fans
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Bruins fans struggle to accept Brad Marchand’s debut for the Panthers

Brad Marchand’s highly anticipated debut for the Florida Panthers has ignited a wave of anger and disappointment among Boston Bruins fans . The NHL veteran, who was unexpectedly traded at the deadline, is set to return to the ice after recovering from an upper-body injury. As Panthers coach Paul Maurice confirmed, "We are shooting for Friday against Utah right now," signaling Marchand’s imminent return. While this marks a fresh start for the seasoned winger, Bruins fans aren’t taking it lightly.Brad Marchand, a key figure in the Bruins’ 2011 Stanley Cup victory, had a rough season before the trade. His exit was a shock, and seeing him suit up for the Panthers so soon has left Boston fans frustrated. With the Bruins currently struggling in the standings, some supporters are hoping that Marchand’s return might not immediately benefit Florida. One fan humorously pleaded, "Can we just deny it at littleeee bit longer?"The trade was already difficult for many to process, but now, with both teams in direct competition for a playoff spot, emotions are running high. The Panthers are sitting second in the Atlantic Division, while the Bruins are near the bottom. Losing a franchise legend to a rival team only adds to the sting.Adding to the frustration, the game will be broadcast on the NHL Network instead of ESPN, making it harder for some fans to watch Marchand’s debut. A disgruntled fan sarcastically remarked, "Guess nobody is watching! Thanks NHL Network." This broadcasting issue is another blow to fans already grappling with the emotional impact of Marchand’s departure.Brad Marchand’s return isn’t just about sentiment—it could significantly impact the Panthers' playoff push. Known for his aggressive playing style and competitive edge, he’s expected to bring a spark to Florida’s lineup. As one fan put it, "Everyone loves a villain redemption arc," referencing Marchand’s reputation as an instigator on the ice. While dismissing his return, the fan wrote, “Who cares? He s*cks.” Another wrote, "Threw up in my mouth."Also Read: Brad Marchand injury update: Florida Panthers set target date for the star player's return With his comeback imminent, all eyes are on how he will perform in his new colors. Whether he becomes a game-changer for Florida or struggles to find his rhythm, one thing is certain—Bruins fans won’t forget this move anytime soon.
Article Summary: Brad marchand is set to make his debut for the florida panthers on friday. Boston bruins fans are frustrated by the timing of his return. The panthers are currently second in the atlantic division, while the bruins are near the bottom. The game will be broadcast on the nhl network instead of espn.

Article Title: “Don't bring politicians on the ice”: Ex-NHL star Ryan Whitney criticizes PM Mark Carney's presence in Edmonton Oilers' pre-game skate
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Ryan Whitney questions the timing of PM Mark Carney’s appearance



Connor McDavid welcomes PM Mark Carney's support



Polarized opinions about political personalities in sports



Former NHL defenseman Ryan Whitney had no qualms expressing his outrage about Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney attending the Edmonton Oilers ' pre-game skate. Whitney, a straight-talker, was taken aback at seeing a politician taking to the ice before an important game and wondered at the wisdom behind it and its effects on the preparation of the players.Showing disbelief at the timing of the visit, Ryan Whitney contended that pre-game skates are essential for the players to get their minds together and prepare. The ex-Edmonton Oilers blueliner noted that politicians should not attend during such times, especially when they are not skilled on ice skates.“This Carney guy, Mark Carney is his name. This guy is out there in a pregame skate… I don't care which way he leans politically. It could be the right-wing guy or the left-wing guy. You don't have a politician on the ice during the pregame skate , not to mention a politician who can't skate,” Whitney ranted. “Don't bring politicians on the ice, let alone on a practice day. We're talking pregame skate. Do you think Ryan Nugent-Hopkins wants some politician standing next to him before a game? You have your preparations.”Whitney's comments quickly resonated with hockey fans , with some thinking that politicians shouldn't interrupt game-day rituals, while others didn't see anything wrong with the visit.Even though Whitney panned the visit, Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid had another take. The superstar forward welcomed Mark Carney's visit, saying it was great to have a lifelong Oilers fan present around the team.“Obviously, it’s nice to have him here. He's an Oilers fan, a lifelong Oilers fan. Oilers fans are welcome here, for sure. I don't know if his security detail would appreciate that too much. But, of course, it's a special thing to bring him here. It was great to meet him,” McDavid said.Mark Carney's ice appearance has ignited controversy, with some regarding it as a friendly gesture and others, such as Ryan Whitney, thinking that it breaks up the team's routine. Support from celebrity figures is welcome to fans, but whether it should only be in the form of off-ice engagement is questionable.Also read: “Nice to have him here”: Connor McDavid on Canada PM Mark Carney's appearance at Oilers morning skate While the Edmonton Oilers' season goes on, the players and their game will continue to be the priority, but the words of Whitney have made sure that Mark Carney's visit will not soon be forgotten.
Article Summary: Canadian prime minister mark carney attended the edmonton oilers pre-game skate. Former nhl defenseman ryan whitney questioned the timing of the visit. Whitney said politicians should not attend during such times, especially when they are not skilled on ice skates.

Article Title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle stuns in new picture as the Oilers face another losing streak
Article Text:
Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, stuns in a new picture as the Oilers face a losing streak again



Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Connor McDavid, the captain of the Edmonton Oilers, is currently not participating in any of the matches for his team as he is busy recovering from an injury that he had sustained. The star player has maintained a low profile since his injury but his wife has been pretty active on social media. Recently, Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, took to her Instagram to post a stunning picture of herself.Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, posted a couple of stories on her Instagram. In one of the stories that she reposted of her friend’s, Lauren Kyle is seen going on a “field trip”.In the next story posted by Lauren Kyle, she looks stunning in a short brown dress. She kept her hair open and opted for black sunglasses to go with the whole look.Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, also opted for gold statement earrings and a gold necklace to complete the whole look. While it is not confirmed where exactly Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle is, she posted a picture of her unique workstation.Lauren Kyle shared a picture of a bed placed under the open sky. The interior designer recently returned from a trip to Las Vegas, where she was joined by other wives and girlfriends of the Edmonton Oilers’ players to celebrate bachelorette parties, including of Leon Draisaitl’s fiancee, Celeste.Currently, both Connor McDavid and his Oilers’ teammate, Leon Draisaitl are trying to recover from their injuries and are not participating. While the team did win a couple of matches without their star players, things soon went downhill.The Edmonton Oilers are now on a losing streak as they lost a recent match to the Dallas Stars and recently faced a devastating loss against the Seattle Kraken.At the moment it has not been confirmed the exact date when Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl will be able to return to the ice.Also Read: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle posts rare update of him as the star player recovers from injury

Article Title: Toronto Maple Leafs' free agency priority rides on Mitch Marner's future, according to NHL insider Nick Kypreos
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Team gives priority to cap space ahead of contract extensions



Mitch Marner's contract situation hangs over



John Tavares and Steven Lorentz in wait-and-see mode



A make-or-break offseason for Toronto



As the NHL summer gets near, the Toronto Maple Leafs are adopting a guarded stance on their roster choices. Based on NHL insider Nick Kypreos , the franchise's first concern is Mitch Marner's future ahead of signing contract extensions on other players, such as John Tavares and Steven Lorentz. Toronto Maple Leafs general manager Brad Treliving is also known to be a Marner enthusiast.The Maple Leafs are said to be waiting on contract negotiations with their upcoming unrestricted free agents until they decide if Marner will remain or if they will have to spend cap room to replace him. “It sounds like pending unrestricted free agents John Tavares and Steven Lorentz will have to wait until the offseason for any contract offers from the Leafs if they are to stay. The Leafs’ top priority remains leaving enough cap space to either re-sign Mitch Marner or bring in one or two players as suitable replacements.” Kypreos said in the Toronto Star.Marner, 27, is set to reach the expiration of his six-year, $65.4 million contract soon, and he continues to perform well on the ice. He has 89 points in 71 games and is still an integral offensive player for the Maple Leafs. Yet if he reaches free agency on July 1, he likely will demand a hefty salary bump, maybe into the $13-14 million per-year area.Despite previous trade speculation, Toronto Maple Leafs general manager Brad Treliving has remained a strong supporter of Marner. The marquee winger wouldn't waive his no-trade clause at the trade deadline, making him the boss of the situation. The Leafs now have to determine if they can keep him or if they will have to look elsewhere.Vet Center John Tavares is also in his seventh and last year of a $77 million, seven-year contract. He has been contributing with 33 goals and 67 points through 65 contests. The Maple Leafs are not hurrying, though, to sign him longer term, holding off to examine how the Marner situation will develop before they commit long-term.Although Tavares is still an asset, Kypreos said his Toronto future will hinge on whether or not the club can generate the cap space necessary.In the meantime, forward Steven Lorentz is going through a one-year, $775,000 deal and has tallied six goals and 16 points in 69 contests. Similar to Tavares, he sits in limbo as the Leafs determine their roster requirements.The Maple Leafs' offseason plan will heavily depend on Marner's choice. If he re-signs, Toronto will have to manage its remaining cap space very carefully to complete the roster. If he departs, the team will have the cap space to go after other high-impact free agents.Also read: Toronto Maple Leafs sign NCAA standout Luke Haymes to two-year contract With free agency only months off, everyone's eyes will be on the Maple Leafs as they make their way through one of the most important off-seasons in recent history.
Article Summary: The toronto maple leafs are said to be waiting on contract negotiations with their upcoming unrestricted free agents. The franchise's first concern is mitch marner's future ahead of signing contract extensions on other players. John tavares and steven lorentz will have to wait until the offseason for any contract offers from the leafs.

Article Title: Donovan Mitchell's injury report (March 28,2025): Is the Cleveland Cavaliers star playing tonight against the Detroit Pistons?
Article Text:
Is Donovan Mitchell playing tonight? (Image via AP Photo/David Dermer)

Cleveland Cavaliers

Donovan Mitchell

Will Donovan Mitchell play tonight against the Detroit Pistons (March 28, 2025)?

Cleveland Cavaliers injury report for tonight’s game against the Detroit Pistons (March 28, 2025)

Cavaliers injury report March 28 (Image via NBA)

Detroit Pistons injury report for tonight’s game against the Cleveland Cavaliers (March 28, 2025)

When and where to watch the Cleveland Cavaliers play tonight against the Detroit Pistons (March 28, 2025)?

Thehave listed three players on their injury report ahead of Friday’s matchup against the Detroit Pistons , but star guardis not among them. The team confirmed Mitchell is fully healthy and expected to play, providing a major boost as Cleveland looks to extend its dominant season. Donovan Mitchell is cleared to play against the Detroit Pistons tonight. He is not listed on the team’s injury report and can be seen on the team’s projected starters list.Mitchell, averaging 23.7 points per game (17th in the NBA) and leading the Cavaliers with 3.3 made threes per contest (8th in the league), remains a critical piece for the Eastern Conference leaders. His availability is key as Cleveland holds the NBA’s top-ranked offense (122.3 PPG) and a +10.4-point differential. The Cavaliers ’ injury report includes Evan Mobley (rest), Jaylon Tyson (knee), and Ty Jerome (knee), all listed as day-to-day. Mobley, averaging 15.9 points and 8.8 rebounds over the last 20 games, could sit for maintenance, while Tyson and Jerome’s statuses will be game-time decisions.Detroit, meanwhile, will be without key players Jaden Ivey (leg) and Cade Cunningham (calf). Cunningham’s absence is a significant blow—the Pistons’ leading scorer (23.8 PPG last 20 games) has been instrumental in their playoff push. Malik Beasley (16.2 PPG) and Jalen Duren (10.2 RPG) will shoulder more offensive responsibility.The game tips off at 7 p.m. ET at Little Caesars Arena, airing on FDSDET and FDSOH. Fans can stream it live on Fubo (regional restrictions may apply).With Donovan Mitchell healthy and the Pistons shorthanded, Cleveland aims to continue its strong form. The Cavaliers’ depth and scoring firepower make them favorites, but Detroit’s resilience at home could test them.Let us know who you are going to side with in tonight's game between the Detroit Pistons and the Cleveland Cavaliers. Also, do not forget to follow TOI NBA for the latest updates on everything happening in the world of basketball.
Article Summary: Donovan mitchell is fully healthy and expected to play for the cleveland cavaliers against the detroit pistons. Evan mobley, jaylon tyson and ty jerome are all listed as day-to-day. The game tips off at 7 p.m. Et at little caesars arena, airing on fdsdet and fdsoh. Fans can stream it live on fubo (regional restrictions may apply)

Article Title: Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce couldn’t stop laughing at Jayson Tatum’s honest reaction to his nickname ‘The Anomaly’
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum and Travis Kelce. Image via: Mitchell Leff/ Getty Images | New Heights Podcast (screengrab)

Jayson Tatum reacted to his nickname ‘The Anomaly’ while speaking with Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce



Where did Jayson Tatum’s nickname come from?



Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum ’s reaction to a particular nickname has sparked plenty of discussion among fans and media alike. Tatum, who has been a star player for the Celtics, recently addressed the growing trend of people calling him ‘ The Anomaly ’ during his chat with NFL star siblings Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce in a new episode a their New Heights podcast .During a guest appearance on the New Heights podcast hosted by NFL stars Travis and Jason Kelce, Jayson Tatum was asked about the nickname that has been making rounds on social media. Travis Kelce, referring to Tatum’s Wikipedia page, brought up the moniker and asked, “Has anybody that is close to you ever actually called you, ‘The Anomaly’?”Tatum was amused. He responded with a candid answer that sent the Kelce brothers into fits of laughter. “Twitter is not a real place, I’ll say that,” Tatum hared. His reaction made it clear that he wasn’t exactly embracing the nickname, despite its growing popularity.Jason Kelce, however, had a different take. “I would run with that one. I like it. ‘The Anomaly’ is a good one. I don’t know who came up with that.” To which Travis Kelce agreed, saying, “It is a banger.”The origins of ‘The Anomaly’ trace back to social media, where an X user first suggested it, pointing out Tatum’s unique skill set. “Handles like someone 6 inches shorter, shoots pull-ups like a guard, finishes at the rim like a center, and consistently defends 1-5.”The nickname got wide attention, and soon, even official team accounts like the Portland Trail Blazers started using it in their game promotions. Basketball Reference has even added it to Tatum’s list of nicknames.Previously, when asked directly if he liked the name, he hesitated before admitting, “Ahhh, I don’t know.” He went on to mention that friends and teammates call him by other names, such as ‘Big Deuce’ and ‘Taco.’Also Read: Jayson Tatum's injury report (March 26, 2025): Is the Boston Celtics star fit to play against the Phoenix Suns tonight? Regardless of whether ‘The Anomaly’ nickname sticks, there’s no denying that Tatum’s game lives up to the title. At 6’10”, his mobility, ball-handling, and scoring ability make him one of the most versatile players in the NBA. He has been a standout star for the Celtics and is arguably one of the most complete players in the league today.
Article Summary: Boston celtics star jayson tatum was a guest on the new heights podcast. He was asked about his nickname 'the anomaly' and his reaction. Tatum responded by saying, "twitter is not a real place, i’ll say that"

Article Title: IPL match today, RR vs KKR: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, Barsapara Cricket Stadium pitch report, weather in Guwahati
Article Text:
Kolkata Knight Riders' players Quinton de Kock and Rinku Singh during a training session ahead of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 match against Rajasthan Royals at ACA Stadium in Guwahati. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pitch report for RR vs KKR

RR in IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals hope for first title in 17 years

RR vs KKR Dream11 Team Prediction

RR predicted playing XI:

RR Impact Sub:

KKR predicted playing XI:

KKR Impact Sub:

RR vs KKR squads, IPL match Today

KKR in IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders seek successful title defence

Rajasthan Royals squad:

Kolkata Knight Riders squad:

RR vs KKR head-to-head record

'RCB bowled really well in the powerplay': Ajinkya Rahane

RR vs KKR IPL 2025, Guwahati weather prediction

IPL 2025: How will KKR, MI, CSK, SRH, RCB fare this season?

After being outclassed in their previous matches, title holders Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals are looking for a quick turnaround when they meet in an IPL match today (March 26).The Knight Riders lost to Royal Challengers Bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener, while the Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against Sunrisers Hyderabad.Both teams share a common issue: their once-impressive batting and bowling units have failed to perform. While the Royals might attribute their bowling struggles to playing at a difficult Hyderabad venue, the Knight Riders lack such an excuse.Except for Sunil Narine, none of the KKR bowlers managed to restrain the aggressive RCB lineup, raising concerns about the effectiveness of mystery spinner Varun Chakravarthy, who struggled significantly. Even on Eden Gardens' pitch, which had some grip, Chakravarthy was hit hard by Phil Salt and Virat Kohli.The KKR camp is hopeful that Chakravarthy will regain his form on a Guwahati pitch that typically offers more assistance to bowlers.The Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati has hosted four matches in IPL history - two in 2023 and two in 2024. The highest total at this ground came courtesy Rajasthan Royals who scored 199 against Delhi Capitals. The RR vs KKR fixture was washed out last year at this venue.Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Riyan Parag(c), Nitish Rana, Dhruv Jurel(wk), Shimron Hetmyer, Shubham Dubey, Jofra Archer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Akash Madhwal.Yudhvir Charak/Kunal Singh Rathore.Quinton de Kock (w), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Venkatesh Iyer, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Rinku Singh, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Spencer Johnson, Varun Chakaravarthy.Vaibhav Arora/Manish Pandey.Sanju Samson (c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel, Jofra Archer, Shimron Hetmyer, Tushar Deshpande, Wanindu Hasaranga, Maheesh Theekshana, Nitish Rana, Sandeep Sharma, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Kwena Maphaka, Akash Madhwal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Shubham Dubey, Yudhvir Singh, Kunal Singh Rathore, Ashok Sharma, Kumar KartikeyaRinku Singh, Varun Chakaravarthy, Sunil Narine, Andre Russell, Harshit Rana, Ramandeep Singh, Venkatesh Iyer, Quinton de Kock, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Anrich Nortje, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Vaibhav Arora, Mayank Markande, Rovman Powell, Manish Pandey, Spencer Johnson, Luvnith Sisodia, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Anukul Roy, Moeen Ali, Chetan SakariyaAs the RR vs KKR head-to-head record reads, the two teams have played each other 30 times in the IPL, with the Royals and the Knight Riders winning 14 each. Two matches ended in no results.Interestingly two of the matches between the two teams went into Super Overs with the Royals clinching both of them.Guwahati is predicted to witness nearly 50% humidity while reeling 25-30 degree Celsius weather. The humidity level is expected to rise as the evening progresses which could make things daunting for the team fielding second.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders and rajasthan royals meet in ipl match today (march 26) knight riders lost to royal challengers bengaluru by seven wickets in their opener. Royals suffered a 44-run defeat against sunrisers hyderabad. The rr vs kkr fixture was washed out last year at this venue.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, CSK vs RCB: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
CSK vs RCB (BCCI Photo)

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) ended a 17-year winless streak at Chepauk with a dominant 50-run victory over Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in Friday's IPL match. RCB posted a competitive 196/7, with Rajat Patidar leading the charge with a fortuitous 51 runs off 32 balls, supported by Tim David’s late blitz (22* off 8 balls).Despite early fireworks from Phil Salt (32 off 16 balls) and Devdutt Padikkal (27 off 14 balls), RCB struggled in the middle overs, but Patidar’s knock and David’s late hitting propelled them to a solid total.CSK’s chase never gained momentum as they crumbled to 146/8, with key wickets falling early. Josh Hazlewood was the standout performer with the ball, claiming 3/21, including the vital scalps of Rahul Tripathi and Ruturaj Gaikwad, reducing CSK to 8/3 within the first two overs.Bhuvneshwar Kumar (1/20) also contributed, dismissing Deepak Hooda.Though Rachin Ravindra (41 off 31 balls) and Sam Curran (8) tried to stabilize, the required run rate surged, and wickets fell at regular intervals. Curran was dismissed by Liam Livingstone, and Ravindra was bowled out by Yash Dayal (2/18), who also removed Shivam Dube (19).CSK’s decision to send Ravichandran Ashwin instead of MS Dhoni at this stage signaled their lack of fight. Dhoni’s 30* off 16 balls, including 2 sixes, was a mere consolation.RCB’s bowlers, including Livingstone and Dayal, tightened the screws, and an outstanding performance from Impact Sub Suyash Sharma (4-0-32-0) kept CSK under control.Patidar’s fortunate fifty and Hazlewood's destructive spell were key to RCB’s historic win, marking a rare defeat for CSK at home and a memorable victory for RCB.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) ended a 17-year winless streak at chepauk with a dominant 50-run victory over chennai super kings (csk) in friday's ipl match. Rcb posted a competitive 196/7, with rajat patidar leading the charge with a fortuitous 51 runs off 32 balls, supported by tim david’s late blitz.

Article Title: MS Dhoni becomes CSK’s highest run-scorer in IPL history
Article Text:
MS Dhoni and Ravindra Jadeja (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: MS Dhoni etched his name in the record books on Friday, becoming Chennai Super Kings ' highest run-scorer in IPL history.His unbeaten 30 off 16 balls in the match against Royal Challengers Bengaluru took his tally to 4699 runs in 236 matches, surpassing Suresh Raina ’s 4687 runs in 176 matches.Despite his late heroics, CSK fell short, managing only 146/8 in pursuit of RCB’s 196/7 at MA Chidambaram Stadium . It was RCB’s first win at Chepauk since 2008, ending a 17-year drought.Dhoni, who has scored 22 fifties for CSK, boasts an impressive average of 40.50 and a strike rate of 139.43. Following Dhoni and Raina on the list of CSK’s top run-getters are Faf du Plessis (2721 runs in 92 matches), Ruturaj Gaikwad (2433 runs in 68 matches), and Ravindra Jadeja (1939 runs in 174 matches).Earlier, RCB’s innings was powered by captain Rajat Patidar’s 51 off 32, supported by Phil Salt (32 off 16) and Virat Kohli (31 off 30). Josh Hazlewood rattled CSK’s chase with early breakthroughs, dismissing Rahul Tripathi and Gaikwad in his first over. Rachin Ravindra’s 41 offered brief resistance, but CSK fell short, giving RCB a landmark victory.
Article Summary: Ms dhoni becomes highest run-scorer in ipl history. His unbeaten 30 off 16 balls in the match against royal challengers bengaluru took his tally to 4699 runs in 236 matches. Csk fell short, managing only 146/8 in pursuit of rcb’s 196/7 at ma chidambaram stadium.

Article Title: Finally it's over! RCB end 17-year losing streak against CSK at Chepauk
Article Text:
Royal Challengers Bengaluru's Josh Hazlewood celebrates with teammates after taking a wicket. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

STATS: RCB vs CKS at Chepauk

2008 - Won by 14 runs

2010 - Lost by 5 wickets

2011 - Lost by 21 runs

2011 - Lost by 58 runs

2012 - Lost by 5 wickets

2013 - Lost by 4 wickets

2015 - Lost by 24 runs

2019 - Lost by 7 wickets

2024 - Lost by 6 wickets

2025 - Won by 50 runs

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) finally broke their 17-year losing streak at MA Chidambaram Stadium , defeating Chennai Super Kings by 50 runs in their IPL 2025 clash on Friday. This was RCB’s first win at the venue since their 14-run triumph on May 21, 2008, during the inaugural IPL season.It was the tenth meeting between the two popular franchises at Chepauk, where CSK had dominated with eight consecutive wins since 2010. While CSK went on to win five IPL titles during this period, RCB continued their search for a maiden championship.Batting first, RCB put up a commanding 196/7 in 20 overs, with captain Rajat Patidar leading from the front with a 32-ball 51. Phil Salt (32 off 16) set the tone early, while Virat Kohli (31 off 30) and Tim David (22 off 8) added crucial runs.CSK’s chase got off to a disastrous start as Josh Hazlewood struck twice in his first over, dismissing Rahul Tripathi and Ruturaj Gaikwad. Rachin Ravindra (41 off 31) fought back, but regular wickets derailed CSK’s pursuit.MS Dhoni (30 not out off 16) provided late fireworks, but it wasn’t enough as CSK managed 146 for 8 in their 20 overs, handing RCB a long-awaited win at Chepauk.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) finally broke their 17-year losing streak at ma chidambaram stadium. Rcb defeated chennai super kings by 50 runs in their ipl 2025 clash on friday. This was rcb’s first win at the venue since their 14-run triumph on may 21, 2008, during the inaugural ipl season.

Article Title: 'Everything seems okay, but …': Mahela Jayawardene gives update on Jasprit Bumrah's recovery
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Vyshak Vijaykumar reveals how Shreyas Iyer and Arshdeep Singh backed his 'wide yorkers' plan

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians head coach Mahela Jayawardene has provided an update on Jasprit Bumrah ’s recovery, stating that the star pacer is still recuperating from his back injury at the BCCI Centre of Excellence ."Everyone is available except for Bumrah. Like I said in my last interview as well, it's on a daily basis that he's going through his programme," Jayawardene told the media on the eve of MI’s match against Gujarat Titans on Saturday.Also see: CSK vs RCB Live Score He emphasised that while Bumrah’s recovery is progressing well, there is no specific timeline for his return. "So far, everything seems okay. But there were no timelines given by NCA, so we'll wait on that," he added.Jayawardene also addressed the high-scoring trend in IPL 2025 but remained confident in MI’s experienced bowling attack."We've got a very experienced bowling attack, and they don't think like that. Each venue and opposition presents different challenges, and that’s something we will focus on," he explained.Additionally, Jayawardene confirmed that Arjun Tendulkar, who was recovering from a brief illness, will be considered for selection if required.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians head coach mahela jayawardene has provided an update on jasprit bumrah’s recovery. The star pacer is still recuperating from his back injury at the bcci centre of excellence. Mi face gujarat titans in the ipl on saturday.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Rajat Patidar, Josh Hazlewood power RCB to their first Chepauk win over CSK since 2008
Article Text:
Rajat Patidar and Josh Hazlewood (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) secured a convincing 50-run win over Chennai Super Kings ( CSK ) in the eighth match of the 2025 Indian Premier League , thanks to stellar performances from Rajat Patidar and Josh Hazlewood CSK, chasing a target of 197, faltered in their pursuit, finishing with just 146/8 in their 20 overs.RCB, after being put in to bat by CSK, posted a formidable total of 196/7.The innings was built around Patidar's crucial knock of 51 runs off 32 balls, a composed effort that anchored the middle order after early wickets fell.Patidar's knock, which included four boundaries and three sixes, came at a brisk strike rate of 159.38.His efforts were complemented by Tim David’s unbeaten 22 off 8 balls, which ensured that RCB maintained momentum despite losing wickets at regular intervals.The standout bowling performance for RCB came from Josh Hazlewood, who wreaked havoc with the new ball, claiming two wicketsin the first over. He later got another one, picking up a figure of 3/21 runs in his 4 overs.Hazlewood was instrumental in breaking CSK's chase early, dismissing Rahul Tripathi, Ruturaj Gaikwad, and Ravindra Jadeja, all key CSK batters.His disciplined bowling ensured that CSK never really got into the chase, despite a spirited late attempt from MS Dhoni , who remained unbeaten on 30 off 16 balls.CSK’s chase never gained momentum as they lost wickets at crucial intervals.Hazlewood's early breakthroughs set the tone. Livingstone's wicket of Ravichandran Ashwin was a key turning point.Despite Dhoni’s late resistance, hitting two sixes and three fours in his innings, CSK’s total of 146/8 was insufficient.Hazlewood’s dominance with the ball, paired with Patidar’s vital contribution with the bat, led RCB to a comfortable 50-run victory, leaving CSK to reflect on a disappointing outing at Chepauk.RCB next face Gujarat Titans next Wednesday, while CSK travel to Guwahati for their next match against Rajasthan Royals on Sunday.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) secured a convincing 50-run win over chennai super kings ( csk ) in the eighth match of the indian premier league. Csk, chasing a target of 197, faltered in their pursuit, finishing with just 146/8 in their 20 overs. Rcb posted a formidable total of 196/7, built around rajat patidar's crucial knock of 51 runs off 32 balls.

Article Title: India's fastest man! Gurindervir Singh breaks 100m national record at Indian Grand Prix 1
Article Text:
Gurindervir Singh

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Gurindervir Singh created history by setting a new men's 100m national record , clocking an impressive 10.20 seconds against strong competition at the Indian Grand Prix 1 on Friday.The Punjab athlete, aged 24 and competing for Reliance, surpassed the previous national record of 10.23 seconds, established by Manikanta Hoblidhar in October 2023. Singh's earlier personal best was 10.27 seconds, achieved in 2021.Hoblidhar, also representing Reliance, secured second place with 10.22 seconds, improving his own national record by 0.01 seconds in the men's 100m Final Race D.Competing in adjacent lanes 5 and 6, Singh and Hoblidhar maintained equal pace initially, but Singh ultimately prevailed, beating the previous national record by 0.03 seconds.Reliance dominated the podium as Amlan Borgohain claimed third position with a time of 10.43 seconds.
Article Summary: Gurindervir singh sets new men's 100m national record in 10.20 seconds. Punjab athlete beats previous record of 10.23 seconds by 0.03 seconds. Singh's earlier personal best was 10.27 seconds, achieved in 2021.

Article Title: Virat Kohli becomes highest run-scorer against CSK in IPL history
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli etched his name into the record books once again during Royal Challengers Bengaluru ’s (RCB) IPL 2025 clash against Chennai Super Kings ( CSK ) at the MA Chidambaram Stadium on Friday.Though Kohli struggled to accelerate, his 31-run knock off 30 balls saw him surpass Shikhar Dhawan to become the highest run-getter against CSK in IPL history .Also see: CSK vs RCB Live Score With this innings, Kohli’s overall tally against CSK reached 1,084 runs, overtaking Dhawan’s previous record of 1,057 runs. Kohli took 33 innings in 34 matches to achieve the milestone, whereas Dhawan had set the record in 29 innings. The two remain the only batters to have crossed the 1,000-run mark against CSK in the IPL.Kohli’s highest score against CSK remains an unbeaten 90, and he has registered nine half-centuries against them. He has accumulated these runs at an average of 37.37 and a strike rate of 125.46. In contrast, Dhawan's tally includes a century (101*) and eight fifties.Rohit Sharma follows in third place with 896 runs in 35 matches, while Dinesh Karthik (727 runs in 33 matches) and David Warner (696 runs in 21 matches) complete the top five list.
Article Summary: Virat kohli surpasses shikhar dhawan to become highest run-getter against csk in ipl history. Kohli took 33 innings in 34 matches to achieve the milestone, whereas dhawan had set the record in 29 innings. Rohit sharma follows in third place with 896 runs in 35 matches.

Article Title: MS Dhoni does it again, lightning stumping ends Phil Salt's blazing knock - Watch
Article Text:
MS Dhoni ends Phil Salt's stay with brilliant stumping. (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Watch Dhoni's Magic:

NEW DELHI: At 43, Mahendra Singh Dhoni continues to showcase why he is one of the greatest wicketkeepers in cricket history. In Chennai Super Kings' (CSK) high-voltage IPL 2025 clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) on Friday, Dhoni's incredible reflexes behind the stumps cut short Phil Salt 's blazing innings, leaving fans in awe.Salt, who was in terrific form, had raced to 32 off just 16 balls, smashing five fours and a six. However, his attacking stay at the crease was abruptly ended by Dhoni's sheer brilliance.Also see: CSK vs RCB Live Score Facing a well-disguised googly from Noor Ahmad , Salt attempted a drive but was beaten by the turn. As he momentarily lifted his back foot while trying to regain balance, Dhoni — faster than a blink — whipped off the bails in a flash.The decision was sent upstairs, and replays confirmed what everyone suspected — Salt's foot was in the air when Dhoni executed the dismissal. The MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai erupted as yet another Dhoni masterclass was added to his long list of iconic stumpings.This moment echoed Dhoni's brilliance from CSK's season opener against Mumbai Indians, where he had stunned Suryakumar Yadav with an equally breathtaking stumping. The 43-year-old legend, despite his age, continues to outshine younger wicketkeepers with his unmatched agility and sharp cricketing brain.With every such moment, Dhoni reinforces his status as a generational wicketkeeping genius, proving that in his case, age is just a number.
Article Summary: Ms dhoni's incredible reflexes behind the stumps cut short phil salt's blazing innings. Dhoni — faster than a blink — whipped off the bails in a flash. The 43-year-old legend, despite his age, continues to outshine younger wicketkeepers.

Article Title: Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, Virtual Game Cards and everything else announced at Nintendo's Direct March
Article Text:
Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream , Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, and other sequels, revivals announced

Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025

Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025



Nintendo brings back classic games with Dragon Quest I + II HD-2D Remake, SaGa Frontier 2 Remastered, and Patapon 1+2 Replay



Witchbrook, Disney Villains Cursed Cafe, and other new innovative games on the slate



What's coming soon

Virtual Game Cards and Nintendo News app announced

Virtual Game Card – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025

Nintendo Switch 2 Direct scheduled for April 2



Ahead of the Switch 2 release, Nintendo’s March Direct packed some surprising announcements for its current-gen Switch console, promising exciting games and features for fans to enjoy. The show proved the current Switch still has plenty of life left, with new features like Virtual Game Cards that let players move games between consoles and exciting titles like the return of Tomodachi Life . From big-name series like Metroid and Pokemon to weird new games like the Disney Villains Cursed Cafe, Nintendo showed it can still surprise fans.Nintendo didn't hold back on reviving beloved franchises. Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream marks the first new entry in over a decade, featuring characters living life at sea with promises of bizarre dream sequences. Rhythm Heaven Groove continues the series' tradition of delightful musical challenges, set to arrive in 2026.Metroid Prime 4: Beyond took center stage, showcasing Samus's new psychic abilities on the planet Viewros and teasing a new suit design. The long-awaited Pokemon Legends Z-A impressed with its urban setting around Lumiose City, promising Pokemon encounters beyond traditional grassy areas and introducing the intriguing Z-A Royale tournament.Gradius Origins celebrates the franchise's 40th anniversary with a collection of classic arcade shooters. Marvel Cosmic Invasion brings a beat 'em up experience from the team behind Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge.Classic game lovers are in for a treat. Dragon Quest I + II HD-2D Remake continues the successful visual reimagining of classic RPGs. SaGa Frontier 2 Remastered brings another classic RPG to modern systems, while Patapon 1+2 Replay resurrects the beloved rhythm-based strategy games.The Direct showcased an eclectic mix of innovative games. Witchbrook promises a chill co-op experience in a witch academy, while Disney Villains Cursed Cafe lets players serve drinks to notorious Disney antagonists. Shadow Labyrinth offers a dark, Metroidvania-style take on Pac-Man, and The Eternal Life of Goldman teases an mysterious action-adventure set in a dangerous archipelago.From farming simulators like Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar to rhythm-based adventures like Rift of the Necrodancer, Nintendo is bringing titles across the genres. Everybody Golf Hot Shots promises both serious tournaments and wacky golf modes.The Direct's sizzle reel highlighted several games with specific release dates, including High on Life (May 6), Star Overdrive (April 10), and Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time (May 21, 2025).Perhaps most intriguingly, Nintendo introduced Virtual Game Cards, a system allowing players to virtually "eject" and "load" games between two Switch systems. Nintendo Today, a new app announced by Shigeru Miyamoto, will provide news, comics, and future Switch 2 information.With the Switch 2 Direct just around the corner on April 2, this presentation felt like a nostalgic farewell to the original Switch. The rumours are that the Switch 2 will go on pre-orders on the same day as the upcoming Direct show.
Article Summary: Tomodachi life: living the dream, metroid prime 4: beyond, and other sequels, revivals announced. Nintendo brings back classic games with dragon quest i + ii hd-2d remake, saga frontier 2 remastered, and patapon 1+2 replay. Nintendo today will provide news, comics, and future switch 2 information.
